Uses of Package
se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml

  • Packages that use se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml 
    Package Description
    se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml
    Interfaces and classes for XML signing.
    se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml.impl
    Implementations for XML signatures.
  • Classes in se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml used by se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml 
    Class and Description
    XMLSignatureLocation
    Tells where in an XML document the signature should be inserted or found.
    XMLSignatureLocation.ChildPosition
    Enum for indicating the point within a selected parent node.
    XMLSignerResult
    Represents the result from an XML signature operation.
  • Classes in se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml used by se.idsec.signservice.security.sign.xml.impl 
    Class and Description
    XMLMessageSignatureValidator
    A validator for validing an XML message that is signed.
    XMLSignatureLocation
    Tells where in an XML document the signature should be inserted or found.
    XMLSignatureValidationResult
    Signature validation result for validating XML signatures.
    XMLSignatureValidator
    Specialization of the SignatureValidator for validation of XML signatures.
    XMLSigner
    Interface for XML signatures.
    XMLSignerResult
    Represents the result from an XML signature operation.
